text:
# Help 
This is the _Paper_ quick refrence.

**Keyboard Shortcuts**
- "n" - Create a new paper
- backspace - Delete and close paper
- "Ctl+B" - Insert Bold Characters
- "Ctl+I" - Insert Italic Characters
- "Ctl+T" - Insert Title Characters 

**Note:** To close a window without deleting it, right click and select close
